changeSet.author: brittany.walker

column.name: text
column.value: xero-php API, how to structure query

column.name: content
column.value: I'm try to request bank transactions from a specific account from a certain date using the xero-php API.$xero = new PrivateApplication($config);print_r( $xero->load('Accounting\BankTransaction')->setParameter('AccountID','XXXXXXX-4097-4028-9b99-XXXXXXXXX')->fromDate(new DateTime('2016-06-01 00:00:00'))->execute());which becomes this:

changeSet.sql: insert into forum_posts (user_id, issue_id) values ((select id from users where role='developer'), (select id from issues where status='PENDING'))
